title: Collaborative Learning Design Incorporating Audiovisual Media in Remote Language Instruction for K-12

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and collaborative learning experience
context.additional_context: Participating in real-time video classes with personal devices and improving language expression skills through video creation and sharing activities

learning_goals: Learners can analyze peer-produced 3-minute-or-less language learning videos with over 80% accuracy through peer evaluation and feedback
Learners can produce three or more animation/video contents that enhance language proficiency using digital tools per collaborative group
Learners can apply MOOC-style video presentation techniques during audiovisual media-based collaborative learning processes
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
